Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
